name: Arcane Forest
description:
You find yourself in a magical forest, where only taking a certain path will allow you to escape.  Take a wrong turn, and no matter how deep you are in the forest, you will find yourself back in the beginning.  Or is it the middle of the forest?  You're not so sure anymore.

Use the arrow keys to move, and the mouse to click on the play button when you are ready to escape.  ...Or try to.

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 47 using:

Paint.net

Brackets.io
